A gigantic scythe forged from the vast amount of sinful dreams, due to its disgusting power it's a coveted weapon that collapse entire civilizations
An adorned drape used by the past kings and queens of many necrotic kingdoms, it's power stems from it's connection to the first corrupted soul of a grand ruler, King Alexander

a particularly smaller robe, which has had it's own velvety texture stained by the dried blood of the fallen King Alexander. Since this it has been stolen and passed down along line of many thieves, until finding it's ways locked into the treasure troves of the shatters

The prized jewel of the king's own daughter, who hasn't been seen since his slaughter. It's magic radiates from the gem, which condenses your own hopes and dreams into tools which could make them possible.
